SELECT DISTINCT T.id AS trade_id , T.status AS trade_status , T.type , T.user_id , U.nickname AS user_nickname , T.file_id , (SELECT file_url FROM IMAGE_FILE WHERE file_id = T.file_id ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 1) AS file_url , T.created_at AS trade_created_at , TS.gacha_id , TS.id AS suggest_id , TS.status AS suggest_status , TS.content AS suggest_content , TS.created_at AS suggest_created_at , TS.purchase_item_id AS purchase_gacha_item_id , (SELECT name FROM GACHA_ITEM WHERE id = TS.purchase_item_id) AS purchase_gacha_item_name , TS.purchase_count , TS.purchase_discount_yn , TS.purchase_discount_price , TS.exchange_seller_item_id , (SELECT name FROM GACHA_ITEM WHERE id = TS.exchange_seller_item_id) AS exchange_seller_item_name , TS.exchange_suggested_item_id , (SELECT name FROM GACHA_ITEM WHERE id = TS.exchange_suggested_item_id) AS exchange_suggested_item_name , TS.exchange_change_yn FROM TRADE_SUGGEST TS INNER JOIN TRADE T ON T.id = TS.trade_id INNER JOIN USER U ON U.id = T.user_id WHERE TS.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY TS.created_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

mapper.update: UPDATE TRADE_SUGGEST SET status = 'CANCELED' , updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{suggestId} AND user_id = #{userId}
